sentences.sentence: Big tech is bracing itself for major change, as the European Commission announced on Wednesday one of the biggest ever crackdowns on some of the world's largest businesses.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: For the first time, the European Commission named six of what it's calling gatekeepers, digital platforms that provide a major gateway between businesses and consumers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They will now be subject to a strict set of new rules.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's a very important milestone for freedom and innovation online in Europe, as the most impactful online companies, we call them gatekeepers, will now have to play by our rules, our European rules.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The six companies in the spotlight are Google's parent company Alphabet, Amazon, Apple, TikTok's ByteDance, Meta and Microsoft.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: 22 online platforms have been identified as holding too much market power, including Instagram, WhatsApp Messenger, YouTube and Google Search. If gatekeepers fail to comply with the new rules by March next year, they could face fines of up to 10 or even 20 percent of their worldwide turnover. The point is not to completely revouche, to change completely their business model, but they have to adapt it. For instance, Apple will have therefore to make what is technically called as sideloading, so the capacity of Spotify to connect directly with the user more easily. So Apple will have to change their product. So I think the ultimate aim is to have more players and more choice and more innovation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The announcement is part of the EU's Digital Markets Act, which aims to make it easier and cheaper for smaller companies to compete within the digital market.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Despite this, experts expect there to be legal challenges to the new rules by some of the freshly named gatekeepers.
